content: this legal text provides an overview of a specific case referred to as case n° 128032013 without disclosing the names of the parties involved the case started in september 2009 and lasted for four years until november 2013 the court made a determination regarding the distribution of assets among coheirs based on article 727 of the civil code the italian republic represented by the italian people is involved in the legal proceeding in the court of naples the court found in favor of the plaintiffs counsel in june 2013 as the defendant did not appear in court the plaintiff provided sufficient evidence to support their claim for an accounting of the inheritance assets the court ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiff a specific amount plus interest as well as the costs of the litigation and the courtappointed expert opinion the defendant mr accomplishment was declared in contempt of court the plaintiff mr name omitted was awarded a sum of €62446 plus legal interest and the defendant was ordered to pay the plaintiffs legal costs and the expenses related to the official technical consulting the judgment is enforceable and was decided on november 18 2013 by a single judge
